member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_EXISTING_HEAPS
member.summary: Provides detail about whether the adapter supports creating heaps from existing system memory. Such heaps are not intended for general use, but are exceptionally useful for diagnostic purposes, because they are guaranteed to persist even after the adapter faults or experiences a device-removal event. Persistence is not guaranteed for heaps returned by or , even when the heap resides in system memory.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_EXISTING_HEAPS.Supported
member.summary: TRUE if the adapter can create a heap from existing system memory. Otherwise, FALSE.
